thread.title: Agent: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson agree to 5-year, $82 million deal - CBSSports.com
thread.title_full: Agent: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson agree to 5-year, $82 million deal - CBSSports.com

title: Agent: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson agree to 5-year, $82 million deal - CBSSports.com
text:
Agent: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson agree to 5-year, $82 million deal By James Herbert | NBA writer October 21, 2015 7:11 PM ET 
Thompson and the Cavaliers had been in a standoff after reportedly being "close" to an agreement on the first day of free agency . At training camp, LeBron James -- a fellow Paul client -- called the situation "a distraction," and said that Thompson had "extreme" value to the Cavs. 
The dollar value here means that Cleveland does indeed consider him extremely valuable, even though he is arguably a luxury for a team that signed Kevin Love to a long-term deal. While Thompson -- an excellent offensive rebounder and mobile big man -- doesn't fit the profile of a typical $ 
Tristan Thompson will remain a Cavalier. (USATSI
